class_libraries.library:
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserArrayFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserArrayFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter which runs two internal MultiChannelFilterChain filters on the range and intensity measurements.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanIntensityFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanIntensityFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter which filters sensor_msgs::LaserScan messages based on intensity
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanRangeFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanRangeFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter which filters sensor_msgs::LaserScan messages based on range
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/ScanShadowsFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::ScanShadowsFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter which filters points from a laser scan that look like the veiling effect.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/InterpolationFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::InterpolationFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter that will generate range readings for error readings in a scan by interpolating between valid readings on either side of the error
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanAngularBoundsFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanAngularBoundsFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter that removes points in a laser scan outside of certain angular bounds.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanAngularBoundsFilterInPlace" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanAngularBoundsFilterInPlace" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter that removes points in a laser scan inside of certain angular bounds.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanSectorFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanSectorFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter that removes points in a laser scan inside/outside of a circle sector.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanBoxFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanBoxFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter that removes points in a laser scan inside of a cartesian box.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanPolygonFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanPolygonFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter that removes points in a laser scan inside of a polygon.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanSpeckleFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanSpeckleFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter that removes speckle points in a laser scan by looking at neighbor points.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanMaskFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanMaskFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter that removes points on directions defined in a mask from a laser scan.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserMedianFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserMedianFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
DEPRECATED: This is a median filter which filters sensor_msgs::LaserScan messages.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/LaserScanFootprintFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::LaserScanFootprintFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
DEPRECATED: This is a filter which filters points out of a laser scan which are inside the inscribed radius.
<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/ScanBlobFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::ScanBlobFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter which extract blob object (human's foot, chair's foot) from a laser.

<class name="multirobot_laserscan_filter/PointCloudFootprintFilter" type="multirobot_laserscan_filter::PointCloudFootprintFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
DEPRECATED: Remove points from the pointcloud inside the robot base.
